name: Easy Vegan Tomato Soup
description: Learn how to make the BEST Vegan Tomato Soup ever! Silky smooth, dairy free but creamy and made with simple ingredients you probably have in your pantry right now.
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons olive oil (or water for oil free)
1/2 teaspoon salt, or more to taste
1 teaspoon granulated sugar, optional to cut the acidity

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, saute the onion in the olive oil (or water) for 4-5 minutes over medium heat, until soft and translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the crushed tomatoes and vegetable broth and stir. Bring to a boil, then lower heat and simmer for about 20 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the crushed tomatoes and vegetable broth and stir. Bring to a boil, then lower heat and simmer for about 20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: To a high powered blender, add the raw cashews. Now carefully transfer the soup to the blender as well (unless you double the recipe, it should all fit). Use a towel to protect yourself from any splatters, and blend until very smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: To a high powered blender, add the raw cashews. Now carefully transfer the soup to the blender as well (unless you double the recipe, it should all fit). Use a towel to protect yourself from any splatters, and blend until very smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Return the blended soup to the pot and taste. Add salt to taste, and stir in a teaspoon of sugar to cut the acidity a little bit. Serve with salad, croutons, a loaf of bread, or dip vegan grilled cheese into it! Enjoy.
